plot.io.input package¶

Submodules¶

plot.io.input.parse module¶

Parse the user input configuration file, update the default configuration dictionary with the user-defined values and return the updated dictionary.

plot.io.input.parse.parse(user_config_file, default_config_file)[source]¶

Return an updated configuration file

Read a user configuration file and a default configuration file. Use the values in the user configuration file to update the default configuration file. Finally return an updated configuration dictionary.

Parameters:user_config_file (str) – user configuration file
Returns:an updated configuration dictionary

plot.io.input.parser module¶

Return an appropriate parser based on file extension name.

plot.io.input.parser.parser(file_name)[source]¶

Return a parser function

Return a function can read user input file and return a dictionary.

Parameters:file_name (str) – input file name
Returns:a dictionary containing the content of the file.

plot.io.input.readAll module¶

Read all the content of a file and return one big string.

plot.io.input.readAll.readAll(file_name)[source]¶

Return the file content

Return the content of a file as string.

Parameters:file_name (str) – name of the input file
Returns:a string which is the content of the file
